items.description: A sprawling garden showcasing a diverse collection of flora, including rare orchids and rhododendrons.
items.Famous_for: Exotic flowers, scenic landscapes, and a serene atmosphere.

items.description: The highest peak in the Nilgiris, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding hills and valleys.
items.Famous_for: Stunning vistas, hiking trails, and a tea plantation.

items.description: A picturesque artificial lake surrounded by lush greenery, popular for boating and picnicking.

items.description: A visit to a local tea factory to witness the process of tea production, from leaf to cup.
items.Famous_for: Insight into tea cultivation, tea tasting sessions, and scenic views.

items.description: A vast garden with a diverse collection of flora, including exotic plants and trees.
items.Famous_for: Serene atmosphere, beautiful flowers, and a peaceful walk.

items.description: A historic stone house built in the 19th century, now a museum showcasing the history of Ooty.
items.Famous_for: Architectural marvel, antique furniture, and historical artifacts.

items.description: A scenic walking path with breathtaking views of the valley and surrounding hills.
items.Famous_for: Panoramic views, fresh air, and a peaceful walk.

items.description: A small, serene lake surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for a relaxing picnic or stroll.
items.Famous_for: Tranquil waters, lush surroundings, and scenic views.

items.description: A picturesque lake nestled amidst the hills, offering boating and fishing opportunities.
